name: To-Tomb
description:
A short atmospheric game where you ... a block person completes mini-games that you find by exploring in a rather linear fashion.

///////     Narrative    /////// 

Intro: "'Everything gained comes partnered with loss', I've lost... I'm sick of this emptiness..."

Start of 1st trial: "Is this my first trial? but how do I... Catrick! I understand, as life comes with death these trials need two parts."

    "You get down there and I'll guide you through from above."

End of 1st trial: "... I don't feel any different. I must press-on."

End of 2nd trial: "There's no stopping now, this must be the answer."

End of 3rd trial: "I have nothing... I mean no one else to lose."

End of game: 

A civilization, now lost to the world, fulled the temple city. Worshipping the alchemic tome whats knowledge was only known to the priests, a title bestowed to those who felt the tomes call and overcame the trials.

A priest, corrupted by the temptation of the tomes great power, abused the knowledge gained.

The price for this grave act was severe and sudden, mass extinction of the civilization. Each soul of the temple city, absorbed by the tomes unnatural forces to re-establish balance.

Now laying dormant, the tome has yet to awaken... until this day...
